Macaroni boiled 2 cups 

Baked beans 1 can 

Capsicum 1 cut into rings 

Onion 1 cut into rings 

Tomato puree ½ cup 

Flour 1 tbsp heaped 

Ginger finely chopped 1 tbsp 

Garlic finely chopped 1 tbsp 

Crushed red pepper 1 tsp 

Salt ½ tsp 

Butter 2 tbsp 

Cheese 2 to 3 tbsp 

Ketchup 2 tbsp

Mix flour with tomato puree and keep aside, heat butter in a wok add crushed ginger garlic, cook for 1 minute, add capsicum rings and onion rings, toss for 1 minute and remove, add in crushed red chilies alt, tomato puree, baked beans, fold in boiled macaroni, add ketchup, spread mixture in a greased baking dish, topped with onion and capsicum rings, spread with grated cheese, dot with 1 tbsp butter, bake for 15 minutes on 180 degree C.
